content: hi all, 14th Jan was World Logic Day (yes, there's one organized by UNESCO https://wld.cipsh.international/) and we launched a Women in Logic (WiL) website. WIL as a workshop has been going on since 2017 and you can read more about the workshops in https://sites.google.com/view/womeninlogic. Now it would be good to get more women in the spreadsheet Women in Category Theory(https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1lb3zW7Zk-KI0mY0x7dLZ0pHFeLLeobc5itTBrtVBwAo/edit#gid=0), please tell others about it!
